These addresses will also receive an airdrop later but locked tokens $esPIKA 🪂 https://t.co/eRsksZy5Gm

Whitelisted users who interacted with the protocol will be able to particpate in their public sale @ 37m mkt cap
+ mention retroactive airdrop
https://twitter.com/PikaProtocol/status/1655895942602838018?s=20 https://t.co/X6iNvIWW1h
